= Integrating Pinax Blog =

== Installation ==

1) download a tarball of pinax here:

http://github.com/pinax/pinax/tree/master

extract archive into a folder

cd into the /pinax/apps directory

copy the blog directory into /newsroom/apps


2) Go to: /projects/social_project/templates

copy site_base.html into 

/newsroom/templates

3) copy /pinax/templates/default/blog

to

/newsroom/templates


3) add to settings.py INSTALLED_APPS:
{{{
    'blog',
    'threadedcomments',
    'notification',
    'tag-app',
    'pagination',
    'ajax_validation',
    'django-openid',
    'django.contrib.comments',
    'django.contrib.markup',

}}}

4) in newsroom/urls.py add the line:
{{{
     (r'^blog/', include('blog.urls')),
}}}

5) run:


{{{
./manage.py reset blog
./manage.py syncdb
./manage.py runserver
}}}



== Blogging ==

Add edit/blog entries here:

http://localhost:8000/admin/blog/

View them here:

Go to http://localhost:8000/blog
